n=int(input())

L=list(map(int,input().split()))

T=int(input())

X=[0]*1005

for i in range(len(L)):
    X[L[i]]+=1

for i in range(1,1005):
    X[i]+=X[i-1]
best=0
for i in range(1+T,1005):
    if(X[i]-X[i-T-1]>best):
        best=X[i]-X[i-T-1]
print(best)
n = int(input())
t = list(map(int, input().split()))
tem = int(input())
t.sort()
rmax = 1
for cont in range(0,n-1):
    r = 1
    for cont2 in range(cont+1,n):
        if t[cont2] -t[cont] <= tem:
            r += 1
        else:
            break
    if r > rmax:
        rmax = r

print(rmax)

n = int(input())
a = sorted(map(int, input().split()))
dt = int(input())

ans, l, r = 0, 0, 0
while r < len(a):
    while r < len(a) and a[r] - a[l] <= dt:
        r += 1
    ans = max(ans, r - l)
    l += 1

print(ans)
n = int(input())
p = list(map(int,input().split()))
T = int(input())
p.sort()
fs = 0
maxx = 0
for i in range(n):
    while fs<n and p[fs]-p[i]<=T:
        fs+=1
    maxx  = max(maxx,fs-i)
print(maxx)
n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))
t = int(input())

v.sort()
ret = 1
lef = 0
rit = 1
while rit < n:
    while rit < n and v[rit] - v[lef] <= t:
        rit = rit + 1

    ret = max(ret, rit - lef)
    lef = lef + 1

print(ret)

n = int(input())
l = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
T = int(input())
l.sort()

M = 1
inz = 0
fin = 1
count = 1

#print(l)

while fin<n:
    #conta il num max se si parte da inz
    while fin<n and l[fin]-l[inz]<=T:
        count+=1
        fin+=1
    
    #print(count)
    #print(inz)
    #print(fin)
    #print()
    
    if count>M:
        M = count
    
    inz+=1
    count-=1
    if fin<inz:
        fin = inz
        count = 1              

print(M)

n, t = input(), [0] * 1002
for i in map(int, input().split()): t[i] += 1
T = int(input()) + 1
for i in range(1000): t[i + 1] += t[i]
print(max(t[i + T] - t[i] for i in range(-1, 1001 - T)))
def halyava(lst, t):
    count = 1
    for i in range(len(lst)):
        for j in range(i + 1, len(lst)):
            if sorted(lst)[j] - sorted(lst)[i] <= t:
                count = max(j - i + 1, count)
    return count


n = int(input())
b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
T = int(input())
print(halyava(b, T))

n, v= int(input()), list(sorted(map(int, input().split())))
t = int(input())

ans = 0

for i in range(n):
    k = 0
    for j in range(i + 1, n):
        if v[j] - v[i] <= t:
            k += 1
    ans = max(ans, k + 1);

print(ans)




n = int(input())
time = list(map(int, input().split()))
t = int(input())
num = []
time.sort()
tmax = time[-1]
tmin = time[0]
if time[-1] - time[0] <= t:
    print(n)
else:
    la = 0
    stu = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if time[i] <= tmin + t:
            stu += 1
            la = i
        else:
            break
    num.append(stu)
    for i in range(1, n):
        if time[i] + t > tmax:
            break
        if time[i] == time[i - 1]:
            stu -= 1
        else:
            x = time[i] + t
            stu -= 1
            if x <= time[la]:
                break
            else:
                for j in range(la + 1, n):
                    if time[j] <= x:
                        stu += 1
                        la = j
            num.append(stu)
    print(max(num))
n = int(input())
m = list(map(int, input().split()))
t = int(input())
m.sort()
if n == 1 or len(m) == 1:
    print(1)
elif m[-1]-m[0] <= t:
    print(n)
else:
    mx = 1
    for i in range(n-1):
        ma = 1
        fr = m[i]
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if m[j]-fr <= t:
                ma += 1
            else:
                break
        mx = max(ma, mx)
    print(mx)

n=int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
k=int(input())

j=1
x=[]
c=0
g=0
a.sort()
#print(a)
for i in range(n):
    f=i
    j=i+1
    g=0
    c=0
    while g<=k:
        if j == n:
            break
        #print(a[f], a[j])
        if g==k and abs(a[f]-a[j])!=0:
            break

        elif g+abs(a[f]-a[j])>k:
            break


        g+=abs(a[f]-a[j])
        c+=1
        j+=1
        f+=1
    x.append(c)


#print(x)
print(max(x)+1)

n = int(input())
lst = list(map(int,input().split()))
t = int(input())
lst.sort()
res=0
from bisect import bisect
for i,x in enumerate(lst):
    j=bisect(lst,x+t)
    res=max(res,j-i)
print(res)

a=list(map(int,input().split()))
t=int(input())
a.sort()
ans=0
for i in range(n):
    j=i
    count=0
    while(j<n):
        if((a[j]-a[i])<=t):
            count+=1
            j+=1

            break
    if(count>ans):
        ans=count
